articles.title: Damage of war: Russian air raid causes widespread devastation near Kyiv
articles.description: A Russian air raid caused widespread devastation in a village near Kyiv on Thursday night. Aerial footage on Friday showed damaged residential buildings and burned cars in the centre of Byshiv village, about 60 kilometres (37 miles) southwest of Kyiv.

articles.title: Pope Francis says Ukraine conflict is "not a military operation but a war"

articles.title: Ukraine is Europe's 'fastest growing refugee' crisis since WWII, says UN
articles.description: The UN described the outflow as "the fastest growing refugee crisis in Europe since World War II". On Saturday it had reported that nearly 1.37 million refugees had fled.
